title.rendered: THE TEN SPOT bloor west village

content.rendered:
beauty bar in bloor west village | THE TEN SPOT®

welcome to 10spot® beauty bar in bloor west village, toronto. our team is full of skilled experts who know how to make you look and feel your best! we offer a variety of services like waxing, facials, nail care, and laser hair removal. when you visit us, our awesome team will set you on track to taking the steps to feeling #LikeATen®

book now!
gift certificates
buy a series
buy a membership
newsletter sign-up

Get Directions

Add Waypoint
show options hide options
Print directions Reset directions
Fetching directions......
Reset directions
Print directions
beauty bar in bloor west village | THE TEN SPOT®
  • 2272 bloor street west toronto, ontario
  • 416-613-0254
  • bloorwestvillage@thetenspot.com

Hours

mon. - tue: 10:00 am – 7:00 pm

wed. - fri: 9:00 am – 7:00 pm

sat.: 9:00 am – 6:00 pm

sun.: 10:00 am – 6:00 pm

our beauty bar services

nails

we offer the best mani pedi in town! we offer nail extensions, gel nails, pedicures, and many more.

See services menu

waxing

we offer top notch waxing services designed to make you #feellikeaten like our brazilly®, thongkini®, general full body waxing, and much more.

See services menu

facials

our team has serious skills when it comes to facial treatments. we offer stress-free facial procedures like anti-aging facials, dermaplaning, chemical peels, and many more.

See services menu

brows

what better way to spoil yourself than by getting your brows and lashes done. wether you’re looking for lash lifts, brow lams, or more, we do it all.

See services menu

laser

hair removal can be tricky, thats why we make it simple with our awesome lineup of laser hair removal treatments like our bikini laser, full body laser, and much more.

See services menu
book now at this location

Check out our awesome reviews!

Excellent waxing services by Glaze. One of the best experiences I've ever had! Thank you so much for making me feel so comfortable and relaxed.
Natasha Mody
1715131877
Anna was very professional, pleasant and great at her job. I highly recommend booking with her.
Kelly Ziger
1713308736
Great service, and I won't lie, getting waxed while watching a movie/TV makes the experience sooooooo much easier. Lovely staff.
julia caron
1712684023
Been coming here for years. Glaze is my go-to for anything. Seriously. Flawless nail services, precise and quick waxing and facial queen! Also my personal brow whisperer! Everyone is really sweet here! It’s on the pricer side but everything is super... clean - so I value that above all. Plus this location has always been convenient.read more
Michelle Hempstock
1706880714
I had an excellent experience here! Romana was friendly, effective and efficient. She was so quick and did an excellent job! I will definitely be coming back!!!
Tami Dacks
1702682675
Very happy with the quality of service and professionalism of the staff. Highly recommend Glaze and Anna, masters of the pedicure, leave feeling relaxed and truly pampered.
Karen Airlie
1701019265
I have been going to the Queen West location for years now for manis, pedis, and waxing. Romana is my go-to girl for all of it!! She's amazing and I love our chats too, while she works. The ladies at the front counter are lovely. Their customer... service skills are top notch and I always look forward to my appt.read more
Lisa H
1700855612
I went in for a quickie manicure and had a great experience! Cool music was playing and everyone was so friendly! Online reservations were easy to make too.
Hannah Starrick
1685717153
So satisfied with my polish Mani. Chose Essie over OPI. And a week later the polish is still intact. Great top coat product!And the girls are so lovely at Queen West.
Kelly Morgan
1676690459
Ok, so let me say my issue is not with this location specifically, but with their booking system AND regular polish (if you know, you know). The atmosphere was very welcoming, but I did feel out of place after I was checked in. However, I will chalk... that up to them having a trainee on the floor at the time. I came in to do threading and get a manicure. Both service providers were dope and provided excellent service. My eyebrows look amazing and my nails were done really well as well EXCEPT THAT REGULAR POLISH IS A SCAM! My mani ending up smudging within 30 minutes of leaving the salon... kinda wished I had gotten gel, but alas that was MY CHOICE and is no fault of the salon. I think I'll use them for my threading (which I forgot was so painful ouch) and I'll try the gel manicure next time as opposed to the regular polish. Overall, a good experience and I will be back again. Oh, almost forgot. The booking system is absolutely trash. I had to go through the forgotten password sequence three times over the span of two days before it worked. It seems like there are two systems, one for the franchise and then one for the individual spa (franchisee), which can be frustrating to use. I eventually was able to book my session the morning of my appointment but that frustration docked a star off.read more
Krystyna Gordon
1651870536
‹
›
